32#ifndef _LINUX_STRING_H_
33#define _LINUX_STRING_H_
34
35#include <sys/types.h>
36#include <sys/cdefs.h>
37#include <sys/null.h>
38
39#include <linux/slab.h>
40
41static inline void *
42memchr_inv(const void *buffer, int c, size_t len)
43{
44 const uint8_t byte = c; /* XXX lose */
45 const char *p;
46
47 for (p = buffer; len-- > 0; p++)
48 if (*p != byte)
49 return __UNCONST(p);
50
51 return NULL;
52}
53
54static inline void *
55kmemdup(const void *src, size_t len, gfp_t gfp)
56{
57 void *dst;
58
59 dst = kmalloc(len, gfp);
60 if (dst == NULL)
61 return NULL;
62
63 (void)memcpy(dst, src, len);
64 return dst;
65}
66
67static inline char *
68kstrndup(const char *src, size_t maxlen, gfp_t gfp)
69{
70 char *dst;
71 size_t len;
72
73 if (src == NULL)
74 return NULL;
75
76 len = strnlen(src, maxlen);
77 dst = kmalloc(len + 1, gfp);
78 if (dst == NULL)
79 return NULL;
80
81 (void)memcpy(dst, src, len);
82 dst[len] = '\0';
83
84 return dst;
85}
86
87static inline char *
88kstrdup(const char *src, gfp_t gfp)
89{
90
91 if (src == NULL)
92 return NULL;
93 return kstrndup(src, strlen(src), gfp);
94}
95
96#endif /* _LINUX_STRING_H_ */
97
